definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><variables><variable type="File" id="config">config</variable><variable type="JsonObject" id="simpleheartjson">simpleheartjson</variable></variables><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="100" y="31"><field name="trigger">mod_load</field><next><block type="variables_set_file"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:config</field><value name="VAL"><block type="file_variable"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:config</field><value name="name"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">simplehearts.json</field></block></value><value name="location"><block type="text_join"><mutation items="2"></mutation><value name="ADD0"><block type="get_game_directory"></block></value><value name="ADD1"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">/config/</field></block></value></block></value></block></value><next><block type="controls_if"><mutation else="1"></mutation><value name="IF0"><block type="file_exists"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:config</field></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="console_log"><field name="message_type">info</field><value name="message"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">Simple Hearts config loaded.</field></block></value></block></statement><statement name="ELSE"><block type="create_file"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:config</field><next><block type="add_json_property"><field name="JOBJVAR">local:simpleheartjson</field><value name="name"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">MaxAmount</field></block></value><value name="value"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">40</field></block></value><next><block type="add_json_property"><field name="JOBJVAR">local:simpleheartjson</field><value name="name"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">StartingHealthToggle</field></block></value><value name="value"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">FALSE</field></block></value><next><block type="add_json_property"><field name="JOBJVAR">local:simpleheartjson</field><value name="name"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">StartingHealth</field></block></value><value name="value"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">20</field></block></value><next><block type="write_txt"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:config</field><statement name="text"><block type="write_json"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="JOBJVAR">local:simpleheartjson</field><field name="VAR">local:config</field></block></statement><next><block type="console_log"><field name="message_type">info</field><value name="message"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">Simple Hearts config created and loaded.</field></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></statement></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
